intro.p: This node splits the input reactions and writes molecules to given reactants, products and catalysts columns. Defines the output column type automatically.
Supported Indigo types: Reaction, Query Reaction
The node is based on the Indigo cheminformatics toolkit.

fullDescription.option: Column name for the input reactions
Flag (append or skip) for molecule reactants column with specified name.
Flag (append or skip) for molecule products column with specified name.
Flag (append or skip) for molecule catalysts column with specified name.

ports.inPort: Table containing Indigo reactions or query reactions
ports.outPort: The same as input, plus the columns with the created molecules
